attributes.comment:
My husband and I are in the process of adopting a daughter. The proposed new increase in fees
seems very unfair to us. We have done all of our paperwork properly and filed promptly. However,
the time from application to a having a child mathced to you has increased substantially.
Therefore, due to no fault of ours, our paper work will be expiring and we will have to reapply. We
understand the need to have current documents; however, it grossly unfair to raise these fees. In
fact we would suggest the renewal fee for expiring documents for the same child be decreased.

We apprecitate your consideration in this matter.

Chris & Jody Lawson
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jody Lawson
